newsitem.title: UK: TABLE-BPB change to accounting ups profit.
newsitem.headline: TABLE-BPB change to accounting ups profit.

text.p: NOTE - Analysts had forecast pre-tax profits in a range between 160 and 165 million stg on the old accounting basis.
The above figures reflect a change in accounting procedures in the results to change the translation basis for currencies from using a closing level to an average exchange rate.
The pretax profit figure also includes gains on disposals. Stripping those gains out pretax profits were 178.3 million stg.
Full company name - BPB Industries Plc.
